message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $18,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Hi Alice, $18,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, thanks for your interest. While I understand your perspective, the product's value is considerably higher than your offer. Could you consider $15,000?
Alice, $15,000 is still a bit out of my range. I'm willing to go up to $11,000. If this works for you, we can close the deal.  If not, I'll have to consider my other options.
